about_the_game:
Dive into the mesmerizing realm of Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins, an epic adventure that unveils the tapestry of creation itself. Crafted by the gods, this expansive world consists of floating realms, each stitched together from fragments of their divine domains. Embark on a monumental quest to become the most formidable ascended god the realms have ever known.

Discover the Grand Tapestry:
As the saga unfolds in the first expansion, Realm of Origins, uncover the secrets of the gods' creation. Traverse across these magnificent floating islands, unearthing hidden tales, enigmatic histories, and intricate lore that shape the very fabric of this enchanting universe.

Forge Your Destiny:
In this ever-evolving landscape, your journey holds limitless paths. Ascend in power through myriad choices, delving into the heart of divine mysteries and unlocking your latent potential. The realms are your canvas; paint your destiny with the choices you make.

Unveil Hidden Treasures:
Unlock clandestine zones and secret areas, enhancing your odyssey with rich discoveries and unparalleled experiences. Each revelation bestows new insights, empowering you to ascend to greater heights.

Bonds Forged in Adventure:
Forge alliances with friends and comrades, exploring dungeons, facing off against formidable bosses, and indulging in heart-pounding raids. Join forces in exhilarating minigames that strengthen camaraderie and unlock new dimensions of enjoyment.

The Story Unfolds:
Though the overarching narrative is a work in progress, the captivating lore will immerse you in a tale of divine power, cosmic struggles, and untold destinies. Rest assured, the story's completion is in sight, ensuring your wait will be well-rewarded.

Step onto the precipice of Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins. Adventure awaits, realms beckon, and the call to ascend resonates in every corner. Will you answer it?

name: Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 5800H
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic odyssey in Ascended Gods: Realm of Origins. Crafted by gods from their domains, floating realms await your exploration. Ascend in power, unveil secrets, and team up for dungeons, raids, and minigames. Unfold divine lore and become the most potent ascended god.
